mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNABOARD(QNA_UNICK, QNA_QNAC_IDX, QNA_PD_IDX, QNA_STATE, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT) VALUES(#{qna_unick},#{qna_qnac_idx},#{qna_pd_idx},#{qna_state},#{qna_title},#{qna_content})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM QNABOARD ORDER BY QNA_IDX DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE QNABOARD SET QNA_TITLE = #{qna_title}, QNA_CONTENT = #{qna_content} WHERE QNA_IDX = #{qna_idx}
